data.title: Palm-of-the-Hand Stories
data.meta_description: Softcover. Uncorrected proof of first American edition. Translated from the Japanese by Lane Dunlop and J. Martin Holman. Printed yellow wrappers. Slight foxing on page edges, else near fine. Publisher's letter laid in. Kawabata won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1968 the first Japanese author to do so . Item #504360
data.text:
Softcover. Uncorrected proof of first American edition. Translated from the Japanese by Lane Dunlop and J. Martin Holman. Printed yellow wrappers. Slight foxing on page edges, else near fine. Publisher's letter laid in. Kawabata won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1968 (the first Japanese author to do so).

Item #504360
